00004 #define MAXLINE 4096

00006 extern int debug;
00007 
00008 #define DEBUG
00009 #ifdef DEBUG
00010 #define debug_msg(fmt, ...)     \
00011     fprintf(stdout, fmt, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00012 #else
00013 #define debug_msg(fmt,...)
00014 #endif   /* DEBUG */
00015 
00016 #define TRACE
00017 
00018 #ifdef TRACE
00019 #define debug_trace(trace)      \
00020     fprintf(stdout, "%s ===File:%s----- Func:%s -----Line:%d===\n",   \
00021             trace, __FILE__, __func__, __LINE__)
00022 #else
00023 #define debug_trace(trace)
00024 #endif  /* TRACE */
